Label: Quiet-Friendly
Description: This route and/or ferry operator provides low-stimulation environments.

Label: Wheelchair Accessible
Description: This route or operator is confirmed to support wheelchair access.

Label: Pet-Friendly
Description: Allows pets or assistance animals onboard.

Label: Foot Passengers Welcome
Description: Foot passengers can book this route without a vehicle.

Label: Cabins Available
Description: This route offers onboard cabins or private sleeping spaces, ideal to provide a safe space when onboard.

Label: Motorhome & Caravans
Description: This route has options to take motorhomes, campervans and caravans

Label: Ferry Sensory Guide
Description: Sensory guide available for each route or ferry to help prepare you for the journey

Label: Flexible Ferry Options
Description: Ability to board earlier or later ferries depending on availability
